name: No-Bake Chocolate Peanut Butter Bars
author: Nestle Toll House
summary: Just beat, melt, stir, and refrigerate...these bars are that simple.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package NESTLE® TOLL HOUSE® Semi-Sweet Chocolate Mini Morsels, divided
directions: Beat 1 1/4 cups peanut butter and butter in large mixer bowl until creamy
Gradually beat in 1 cup powdered sugar
With hands or wooden spoon, work in remaining powdered sugar, graham cracker crumbs and 1/2 cup morsels
Press evenly into prepared baking pan
Melt remaining peanut butter and remaining morsels in medium, heavy-duty saucepan over lowest possible heat, stirring constantly, until smooth
Spread over graham cracker crust in pan
Refrigerate for at least 1 hour or until chocolate is firm; cut into bars
